response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $15,000. To ensure we both reach an agreeable transaction, I propose a price of $14,000 for this exceptional product. This offer allows you to acquire it at a slight premium over its cost to me while securing a significant saving compared to its value to you. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14000}
